attributes.title: the worst app ever
attributes.review: you know, you’d think the ‘greatest president in us history’ would have a better app, but no. this app is so slow, and it doesn’t even give me news, which is the category it’s listed under.

attributes.title: Dog
attributes.review: After I got this app my dog said he was going to get milk from the store but he never came back. Thanks trump .
When I opened up the app my dogs started randomly barking. I think there’s a spirit in my house now. 😤😭🤮👎

attributes.title: It's a donkey to use!!
attributes.review: This app is like a donkey to use. Just the worst thing in the world, I rather stick my hand in a blender tan use this bloody app.💩🧚🏻🧚🏻

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible it doesn’t even deserve one star. it’s very annoying and sends way to many notifications, overall terrible experience with this app

attributes.title: I was let down....
attributes.review: I expected more from out great Cheeto puff president. They kept spamming my phone I do not stand for this nonsense.

attributes.title: Trump🤢
attributes.review: The moment I opened the app it gave me BAD VIBES. Like who wants a pervert to be the face of America. Not to mention he’s racist and pretty much caused the death of thousands of people.

attributes.title: Spamed
attributes.review: As soon I as I gave them my number they spammed me with calls , texts , and emails . I would give them a good review if they stanned bts though ㅇ노녀ㅛ규어어규규유러록ㅍ유더ㅏ내아러루아아로류다옲ㅇㅍ오오듀유오더디재재바더어유쥬두ㅜ내재비비니이우두듀댜ㅐㅈ고ㅠㅇ자댜유두댪잪ㅇ ㅇㅊ존ㅍㅇㅍ저덮ㅇㄱㅍ

attributes.title: HORRIBLE RACIST AND OFFENSIVE
attributes.review: this app is the worst app ever created it made my cousin break her arm from the hatred and rats started coming out my screen it’s just horrible i hate it.
